liberty-tooltip-purge: Purge the cache of this page.
liberty.css: /* CSS placed here will affect users of the Liberty skin */
liberty.js: /* Any JavaScript here will be loaded for users using the Liberty skin */
liberty-pref-color-main-help: Main color that will be used in this site.
liberty-pref-color-second-help: Secondary color that will be used in this site.
liberty-pref-fonts: Select the font you want to use
liberty-pref-fonts-help: The font will be loaded from Google's servers except for the Malgun Gothic font.
liberty-pref-dark-help: Choose whether to follow system settings when activating dark mode.
